meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of conchology
meanings.sent1: Her conchological knowledge impressed the class during the seashell presentation.
meanings.sent2: The conchological patterns on the shells varied in color and shape.
meanings.sent3: The conchological expert could identify any shell blindfolded!
meanings.sent4: His conchological eye spotted the rare shell hidden among the common ones.
meanings.sent5: The conchological details of the shell were so intricate, it looked like a work of art.

meanings.definition: the study or collection of shells
meanings.sent1: She dedicated her life to conchological research, traveling the world for unique shells.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed an impressive conchological exhibit with shells from all over the globe.
meanings.sent3: The conchological hobbyist had shelves filled with shells of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent4: His passion for conchological exploration led him to discover a new species of shell.
meanings.sent5: The conchological enthusiast could spend hours discussing the beauty of each shell in his collection.
